comment.text: This key displays the label for a field that specifies the name of a header setting within the AI Settings section of the Portal Settings. It appears as a label on a text input field, likely allowing users to customize header names. Translators should ensure this name accurately reflects the setting it describes.

usage.context:
<div>
 <div className={addEditStyles.headersContainer}>
 {Array.from({ length: headerCounts }).map((_, index) => (
 <React.Fragment key={`header-${index * 2}`}>
 <FieldContainer
 labelText={t("AISettings:HeaderName")}
 isVertical
 removeMargin
 labelVisible
 >
 <TextInput
